You'll probably get a good kick out of this game in the first ten or twenty rounds...

After that, the matchmaking throws you to the wolves, rendering you completely helpless against the anemic basement-dwellers who treat the game like it's a full time job with a salary plus benefits.

In other words, the game was no longer fun for me when I reached somewhere around gold rank.

Dead by daylight is an extremely fun game. The devs are still extremely involved in the game, even 8 years later. Sometimes the calls they make are questionable, but they're as quick to fix them as fast a dedicated and passionate team can. Will admit, the community can be a bit toxic, but it can also be absolutely amazing. I have almost a hundred hours in this game, and I will play for many more.

**Want to add an edit after looking at a lot of the negative reviews for this game.
-Every update you're going to see a chunk of people say "They ruined the game." These people are sweaty and their meta got nerfed. You'll usually see they still play the game quite a bit.
-As an almost exclusive killer main, I've never had a bot problem
-Matchmaking DOES kind of suck as a survivor. I've gotten games where the survivor team was comprised of people who I'm sure stream the game for a living playing with people who had likely never played a video game in their life.
-The game does have a pretty solid learning curve, and the lack of practice mode doesn't help

Biegasz śmierdzącym oblechem z siekierą w łapie za kobietami i napier.dalasz je jak naje.bany mąż żonę. Brak jakichkolwiek zasad moralnych i przyzwoitości ze strony twórców doprowadza do powstania tego typu chorych abominacji. O moralności i godności ludzkiej twórcy tego czegoś również nie słyszeli.
good
game good
i love it

A  really entertaining and fun game. It is definitely worth the money. I am not sure if this is horror or not, but if it is... I think it's a perfect amount for those who are scared easily. You very easily get used to the spook, and it's really not that bad. I personally prefer it, because I am not a fan of horror. It's fun to play as killer as well, however a tad bit more advanced. You can learn quick! The currency is pretty cheap, which makes it pretty easy to get new characters to play. Not to mention, they have a great variety of them. They are all fun in their different way, and you just gotta find the one you like. I'd absolutely recommend this game. It's a little bit of survival and a little bit of horror. It's fun both alone and with friends, and communication isn't needed for a win. 👍👍

스트레스를 받고 싶지않다면 생존자로 플레이하시는 것을 추천드립니다. 저는 살인마를 주로 하지만 200시간 이상을 꼬라박아도 도저히 실력이 좋아졌다는 생각이 안드네요. 그리고 살인마의 능력차이가 심하게 나며 능력이 구린 살인마를 플레이할땐 자신의 실력에 회의감을 느끼며 고통스러운 자신을 볼 수 있지만 능력이 뛰어난 살인마를 했을땐 실력에 대한 자신감도 생기고 정신 건강에도 좋을 겁니다. 그래도 살인마는 하지마세요.

Ill just begin by saying after 500 plus hours I can give a full review and say I am addicted to this ever evolving game, newest patch was a struggle but with changes to my survivor builds I can successfully escape matches again of course it is all luck of the draw though but I love Dead by Daylight as it constantly challenges me with the new chapters and new perks killers and survivors get!

I would totally recommend if your looking for a constant challenge this game is for you then.

There are a lot of asymmetrical horror games out there and more coming all the time, but none have proved themselves like DBD has IMO. The devs continue to make pretty questionable buff/nerf decisions at times, but overall the game continues to improve, content is steady and core gameplay is addictive.

tek sorun katilde oyunları geç buluyor

Oyunun mantığı hep aynı jeneratörleri tamir edip katilden kaçmaya çalış ya da jeneratörleri tamir etmeden önce bütün kurbanları öldür. Haritalar, Survivorlar, Perkler ve katillerin çeşidinin fazla olması oyuna derinlik ve taktikli gitme özelliğini kazandırmış olmasına rağmen dediğim gibi mantık hep aynı. Bir zaman sonra sıksa da farklı bir tür olmasından ben beğeniyorum. 8/10
aside from tunneling the game is great

Infelizmente Behavior não ouve a comunidade que gosta do jogo. Última atualização elevou a dificuldade daqueles que jogam como survivers e diminui para aqueles que jogam como killer, elevando a disparidade entre ambos os grupos. Soma-se a isso as inúmeras críticas já feitas sobre o jogo cair e ser punido, a ponto de me obrigar a desistir do jogo (como muitos outros que cansaram de esperar uma solução frente as questões que cansamos de falar)
